alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 8:35PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lee, south central Crittenden, southwestern DeSoto, northern Tunica and northwestern Tate Counties through 900 PM CST... At 835 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Tunica, or 17 miles southeast of Hughes, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hernando, Tunica, Horseshoe Lake, Pinckney, Lake Cormorant, Phillipp, Eudora, North Tunica, Robinsonville, Little Texas, Newport, Clack, Trinity, Frees Corners, Commerce, Prichard, Bruins, Beck, Banks and Bowdre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
